items.content_html: A lightweight decorator-based dependency injection system built for Next.js. Implements class decorators like @Injectable and @Inject with constructor injection and automatic service resolution. Includes centralized HTTP exception handling for clean API route design.For Learning Purpose
items.title: SubarnaKhadka/decorator-di-pattern-nextjs: A lightweight decorator-based dependency injection system built for Next.js. Implements class decorators like @Injectable and @Inject with constructor injection and automatic service resolution. Includes centralized HTTP exception handling for clean API route design.For Learning Purpose

items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches and displays real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. Users can search for any city to instantly view current temperature and weather conditions. Designed for simplicity, responsiveness, and fast access to essential weather info.
items.title: Kishan-shr/Weather-App-Browser-Extension: A lightweight browser extension built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches and displays real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API. Users can search for any city to instantly view current temperature and weather conditions. Designed for simplicity, responsiveness, and fast access to essential weather info.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
